continueOnLedger.title: Continue on your
continueOnLedger.description: Follow the instructions displayed on your Ledger device.

pin.title: Enter your PIN
pin.description: Enter your PIN to unlock your Ledger device.

signTransaction.title: Sign transaction
signTransaction.description: Follow the instructions displayed on your Ledger device.

turnOnSync.subtitle: Turn on Ledger Sync to continue
turnOnSync.text: This is required to be able to fetch you accounts securely. By clicking Turn on Ledger Sync youâ€™ll be redirected to Ledger Live to activate the feature.

success.title: Transaction signed
success.description: You transaction will be processed soon.

error.title: Transaction failed
error.description: There was an error signing your transaction. Please try again.

DeviceNotSupported.title: {device} isn't supported
DeviceNotSupported.description: The {device} isn't supported for the Ledger Direct connectivity on this Dapp
DeviceNotSupported.cta2: Upgrade to a new Ledger Device with 20% off

ConnectionFailed.title: Unable to activate Ledger Sync
ConnectionFailed.description: The connection to Ledger Live to activate Ledger Sync is failing. Please close this tab, open the Ledger Live app (Desktop or Mobile), activate Ledger Sync and reopen the tab

DeviceDisconnected.title: Ledger Device disconnected
DeviceDisconnected.descriptionUsb: The connection to your Ledger {device} has been lost. Plug your Device and unlock it.
DeviceDisconnected.descriptionBluetooth: The connection to your Ledger {device} has been lost. Unlock it and make sure it is nearby.
DeviceDisconnected.descriptionGeneric: The connection to your Ledger {device} has been lost. If you are using USB, plug your Device and unlock it. If you are using Bluetooth, unlock it and make sure it is nearby.
